effect.shortEffect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
effect.full: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

description.sun-moon: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
description.sword-shield: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
